name: Mutiny!! - Grozdana DLC
description:
Requires base game: Mutiny!!

In this expansion, you can choose the languid Sphinx, Grozdana Kakra for your new First Mate. Doing so will lead the two of you into a romance of (incompetent) royal proportions, and as you learn more about her she'll surprise you with secrets, and impress you with her hidden depths (in more ways than one, of course). A new piece of the Mutiny!! story, new CGs and choices and visual novel excitement!

Content Warning

Features dickgirls, animal girls, spider girls, oviposition, animal anatomy on humanoid characters in a sexual and non-sexual context,  moths, wholesomeness, hyper-active canine companion.
